Package javelin.model.world.location.unique

Class TrainingHall

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.Actor
      • javelin.model.world.location.Location
        • javelin.model.world.location.fortification.Fortification
          • javelin.model.world.location.unique.UniqueLocation
            • javelin.model.world.location.unique.TrainingHall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class TrainingHall
extends UniqueLocation
    Designed as a manner of making the lower levels faster, this receives the amount of treasure in gold as a fee and offers a fight which, if won, will offer a free feat upgrade. There are 4 levels and each is a difficult fight for parties of 4 of the same level. The encounter levels are: 2, 7, 10, 17. Inspired by the tower in WUtai on Final Fantasy VII.
    See Also:

    • Field Detail

      • CANDIDATES

        public static final java.util.ArrayList<Monster> CANDIDATES

      • EL

        public static int[] EL
        Actual encounter level for each TrainingSession, by using the shifted-to-zero index. Supposed to be difficult (EL-1) encounter party of levels 1 to 4.

      • currentlevel

        public java.lang.Integer currentlevel
        From 1 upwards, the current training session difficulty, supposed to represent different floors. TODO this is being initialized in 2 places

        getcombatants in class Actor
        Returns:
        Any combatants that are situated in this actor, may return null if this is not a valid request for this type of actor. For performance if a List is returned it should be the canonical one, and thus should not be directly modified by the receiver.
